data.title: The Cunninghame Grahams

data.text: The Cunninghame Graham family have for centuries played a distinguished role in national life, leaving a significant impact on Scottish history, politics and literature. Four members of the family, all of them previously at Ardoch, are given particular mention here – Robert Graham of Gartmore, Robert Bontine Cunninghame Graham, Admiral Sir Angus Cunninghame Graham and Gabriela Cunninghame Graham.
